title: Strengthening Patient Care Practical Skills: VR-Based Film and Television Animation (FTA) Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental computer literacy and comprehension of animation production processes
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can explain the basic principles of 3D animation modeling in a VR environment.
Learners can design and implement simple animation storyboards using VR technology.
Learners can improve the professionalism of animation work by 70% or more through VR-based feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
